title: David Gray On New Beginnings
teaser: The British singer-songwriter talks about his music and plays songs off his new album "Mutineers," which is his tenth record.
contentencoded:
[Note: This show is from a previous interview that aired on June 17, 2014.]

We listen back to our conversation with David Gray from this past spring. The British singer-songwriter is most well known for his 2000 album “White Ladder,” which sold 7 million copies worldwide.

Earlier this year he released his first album in four years, called “Mutineers,” and he spoke with Jeremy Hobson about what it’s been like to put another album out after taking a break.
